short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for Norwegian sign language dictionary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Toleio sin nettleserutvidelse for norsk tegnspr책k. N책r utvidelsen er p책 kan du sl책 opp tegn fra Toleio sin tegnbank direkte fra websiden med et klikk. 

The extension enables Toleio's sign language dictionary for Norwegian Sign Language directly on web pages.  When the extension is enabled you can click on words found in the dictionary and immediately look up the corresponding sign.
